extends java.lang.Object

Example: Logging logger = new Logging(m_rootPath + "\\log\\", "DSServer"); String logInfo = "\n==============\n" + new Date().toString() + " " + "DataSourceEditorServer started at port " + port + "\n"; logger.saveLogbyDate(logInfo);
